ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_id | |- ( z e. CC -> z e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( S C_ CC /\ 1 e. S /\ N e. NN0 ) -> N e. NN0 ) |
| 3 |  | #P_expcl | |- ( ( z e. CC /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( z ^ N ) e. CC ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_syl2anr | |- ( ( ( S C_ CC /\ 1 e. S /\ N e. NN0 ) /\ z e. CC ) -> ( z ^ N ) e. CC ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_mulid2d | |- ( ( ( S C_ CC /\ 1 e. S /\ N e. NN0 ) /\ z e. CC ) -> ( 1 x. ( z ^ N ) ) = ( z ^ N ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_mpteq2dva | |- ( ( S C_ CC /\ 1 e. S /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( z e. CC |-> ( 1 x. ( z ^ N ) ) ) = ( z e. CC |-> ( z ^ N ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( z e. CC |-> ( 1 x. ( z ^ N ) ) ) = ( z e. CC |-> ( 1 x. ( z ^ N ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_ply1term | |- ( ( S C_ CC /\ 1 e. S /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( z e. CC |-> ( 1 x. ( z ^ N ) ) ) e. ( Poly ` S ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ( S C_ CC /\ 1 e. S /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( z e. CC |-> ( z ^ N ) ) e. ( Poly ` S ) ) |
